column4: I have to create a 900GN image :/ since the usb drive has crashed
allright, could just as well format the 2TB disk before I start then
lol, ill give it a shot, even if i can rescue data, I might be more afraid of opening that image later on...
just make sure your filesystem can handle the gigantic file. for ext3, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ext3#Size_limits
